Game Info:

Bookworm:
Feed your appetite for words on PC!

Link letter tiles left, right, up and down to build words and keep Lex sated and smiling. The bigger the word, the better the bonus. Relax or tune up your brain in two modes, but watch out for burning lettersÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ they could spell disaster! 



Bookworm Adventures:
A role-playing word game of epic proportions!

Build words and battle monsters in this spelling sensation! Help Lex rescue his friend Cassandra by forming words from the letter jumble. Survive three mythic storybooks and boost your power with fantastic gems, potions and magical treasures. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the ultimate test of vocabulary valor!



Bookworm Adventures 2:
The vocabularious sequel to the hit word game!

The walls of fiction are collapsing and only Lex the Bookworm can save the world from certain doom! Build words, battle 130 monsters and earn help from six fighting friends. Power up with new treasures and potions. The better the word, the badder the damage!
